label: Fish_02262
text:
(9촀\0As you may know, \02\0Ā촃blowfish \0￿carry

label: Fish_02263
text:
(촀\0Like its cousin the blowfish, when

label: Fish_02264

about its strength as a swimmer.

text:

label: Fish_04189
text:
()촀\0The \02\0Ā촃sturgeon \0￿is a large and long-

label: Fish_04192
text:
(9촀\0The \02\0Ā촃snapping turtle\0￿ is a large turtle

label: Fish_04203
text:
(촀\0The \02\0Ā촃suckerfish\0￿ is a curious fish that

label: Fish_04204
